92.eng-name: Afflictions and the End of the World

hadiths.text: Narrated Usama bin Zaid:Once the Prophet (ﷺ) stood over one of the high buildings of Medina and then said (to the people), "Do you see what I see?" They said, "No." He said, "I see afflictions falling among your houses as rain drops fall

chapter.ara-name: باب قَوْلِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم " وَيْلٌ لِلْعَرَبِ مِنْ شَرٍّ قَدِ اقْتَرَبَ "
chapter.eng-name: “Woe to the Arabs from the great evil that is nearly, approaching them.”
